articles.title: Philippines, Vietnam study digital currencies as Alipay, WeChat Pay spread - Nikkei Asia
articles.description: More Southeast Asian countries moving in the direction of early issuer Cambodia
articles.content:
TOKYO -- The Philippines and Vietnam will start feasibility studies as soon as this month on issuing central bank digital currencies (CBDCs) as Chinese payment apps penetrate Southeast Asia.

articles.title: Gilas Youth dominates Kazakhstan to stay alive in FIBA Asia U16 - Rappler
articles.description: Gilas Youth sets up a quarterfinal showdown against Australia as the Philippines tries to stay in the hunt for a spot in the FIBA U17 World Cup in July
articles.content: MANILA, Philippines Gilas Youth avoided elimination and remained in the hunt for a spot in the FIBA U17 World Cup in July as it crushed Kazakhstan, 83-60, in the FIBA U16 Asian Championship on Thursd… [+2093 chars]

articles.title: Chantalle Ng reunites with former child actor friend after searching for him online - Channel NewsAsia
articles.description: The actress rigorously searched for her childhood friend, former child actor Xiao Li Yuan, whom she first met while on the set of the 2007 Channel 8 drama, Let It Shine.

articles.author: The Star Online
articles.title: Brunei Sultan bids goodbye to 650 soldiers of Royal Gurkha Rifles - The Star Online
articles.description: BANDAR SERI BEGAWAN (Borneo Bulletin/Asia News Network): Sultan Hassanal Bolkiah bid farewell to 650 soldiers and family members from the 2nd Battalion, Royal Gurkha Rifles (2RGR) at their base in Seria, Belait District on Tuesday (June 14).
